title: One Piece
description: A story of a boy named Luffy who dreams of becoming the Pirate King.

title: Monster
description: A psychological thriller about a doctor who saves a boy who later becomes a serial killer.

title: Clannad
description: A heartwarming tale of friendship and family, focusing on Tomoya's relationship with Nagisa.

title: Oregairu
description: The story follows the cynical Hachiman as he reluctantly helps others while trying to avoid social interaction.

title: Rurouni Kenshin
description: The wandering swordsman Kenshin Himura vows to protect the weak while atoning for his past as an assassin.

title: Haikyuu
description: A volleyball-themed anime focusing on Shoyo Hinata and his journey to become a top player.

title: Hajime no Ippo
description: A young boy, Ippo, embarks on a journey to become a professional boxer while discovering his own potential.

title: Bakuman
description: A story about two boys who aspire to become successful manga creators.

title: Wagnaria
description: The quirky day-to-day life of employees at a family restaurant in Japan.

title: ReZero
description: Subaru Natsuki is suddenly summoned to another world and must restart his life each time he dies.

title: Baby Steps
description: Eiichirō Maruo's journey from a beginner in tennis to a professional player.

title: Nodame Cantabile
description: The story of two music students and their struggles with life, love, and classical music.

title: Zatch Bell
description: A battle between children and their demon partners for the title of the Demon King.

title: Tsukimichi
description: A young man is transported to a fantasy world where he must face gods and monsters.

title: Wolf And Spices
description: The journey of a traveling merchant and a wolf deity who seeks to return to her homeland.

title: Classroom of the Elite
description: Students in an elite high school are pushed to their limits in both academics and social manipulation.

title: Hell’s Paradise
description: Criminals are sent to a mysterious island to retrieve an elixir of immortality under the watchful eyes of executioners.

title: Vinland Saga
description: A Viking tale following Thorfinn's quest for revenge and adventure during the Viking Age.

title: Rascal Does Not Dream of Bunny Girl Senpai
description: A high school student encounters strange phenomena surrounding a girl dressed as a bunny.
